        public ControllerB()

    • Method Detail

      • registerUser

        public boolean registerUser(java.lang.String nameU,
                            java.lang.String cc,
                            int optionRegister)
        Register a new user in the system.
        Parameters:
        nameU - The name of the user to register.
        cc - The identification number of the user to register.
        optionRegister - The registration option that determines the type of user. It must be 1 for a Regular user and 2 for a Premium user.
        Returns:
        true if the user registration was successful and added to the user collection, false otherwise.

      • registerBook

        public boolean registerBook(java.lang.String name,
                            int numPages,
                            int dayPublish,
                            int monthPublish,
                            int yearPublish,
                            java.lang.String URL,
                            java.lang.String review,
                            int genre,
                            double priceB)
        Register a new book in the system.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the book.
        numPages - The number of pages in the book.
        dayPublish - The day the book was published.
        monthPublish - The month the book was published.
        yearPublish - The year the book was published.
        URL - The URL of the book.
        review - The book review.
        genre - The genre of the book. 1 for science fiction, 2 for fantasy and 3 for historical novel.
        priceB - The price of the book.
        Returns:
        true if the book registration was successful and it was added to the product collection, false otherwise.

      • registerMagazine

        public boolean registerMagazine(java.lang.String name,
                                int numPages,
                                int dayPublish,
                                int monthPublish,
                                int yearPublish,
                                java.lang.String URL,
                                int category,
                                int valueSub,
                                java.lang.String periodEmission)
        Register a new journal in the system.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the journal.
        numPages - The number of pages in the journal.
        dayPublish - The day the journal was published.
        monthPublish - The publication month of the journal.
        yearPublish - The year the magazine was published.
        URL - The URL of the journal.
        category - The category of the journal. 1 for varieties, 2 for design and 3 for scientific.
        valueSub - The subscription value of the journal.
        periodEmission - The issue period of the journal.
        Returns:
        true if the magazine registration was successful and it was added to the product collection, false otherwise.

      • ListBook

        public java.lang.String ListBook()
        List of books registered in the system.
        Returns:
        A string representing the list of registered books.

      • ListModifyBook

        public java.lang.String ListModifyBook(int option,
                                       java.lang.String newName,
                                       int newNumPages,
                                       int newdayPublish,
                                       int newmonthPublish,
                                       int newyearPublish,
                                       java.lang.String newURL,
                                       java.lang.String newReview,
                                       int newGenre,
                                       double newPriceB)
        Generates a message with the modified information of a book.
        Parameters:
        option - The option number of the book to modify.
        newName - The new name of the book.
        newNumPages - The new number of pages in the book.
        newdayPublish - The new day the book was published.
        newmonthPublish - The new month the book was published.
        newyearPublish - The new year the book was published.
        newURL - The new URL of the book.
        newReview - The new book review.
        newGenre - The new genre of the book.
        newPriceB - The new price of the book.
        Returns:
        A message displaying the modified book information.

      • ListMagazine

        public java.lang.String ListMagazine()
        List of journals registered in the system.
        Returns:
        A string representing the list of registered journals.

      • ListModifyMagazine

        public java.lang.String ListModifyMagazine(int optionM,
                                           java.lang.String newName,
                                           int newNumPages,
                                           int newdayPublish,
                                           int newmonthPublish,
                                           int newyearPublish,
                                           java.lang.String newURL,
                                           int newcategory,
                                           int newvalueSub,
                                           java.lang.String newperiodEmission)
        Generates a message with the modified information of a magazine.
        Parameters:
        optionM - The option number of the journal.
        newName - The new name of the journal.
        newNumPages - The new number of pages in the journal.
        newdayPublish - The new publication day of the journal.
        newmonthPublish - The new month of publication for the magazine.
        newyearPublish - The new year of publication of the magazine.
        newURL - The new URL of the journal.
        newcategory - The new category of the magazine.
        newvalueSub - The new subscription value of the journal.
        newperiodEmission - The new issue period for the journal.
        Returns:
        A message that displays the modified journal information.

      • modifyBooks

        public boolean modifyBooks(int option,
                           java.lang.String newName,
                           int newNumPages,
                           int newdayPublish,
                           int newmonthPublish,
                           int newyearPublish,
                           java.lang.String newURL,
                           java.lang.String newReview,
                           int newGenre,
                           java.lang.Double newpriceB)
        Modify the attributes of a book.
        Parameters:
        option - The option number of the book to modify.
        newName - The new name of the book.
        newNumPages - The new number of pages in the book.
        newdayPublish - The new day the book was published.
        newmonthPublish - The new month the book was published.
        newyearPublish - The new year the book was published.
        newURL - The new URL of the book.
        newReview - The new book review.
        newGenre - The new genre of the book. 1 for science fiction, 2 for fantasy and 3 for historical novel.
        newpriceB - The new price of the book.
        Returns:
        true if the book modification was successful, false otherwise.

      • modifyMagazines

        public boolean modifyMagazines(int optionM,
                               java.lang.String newName,
                               int newNumPages,
                               int newdayPublish,
                               int newmonthPublish,
                               int newyearPublish,
                               java.lang.String newURL,
                               int newcategory,
                               int newvalueSub,
                               java.lang.String newperiodEmission)
        Modify the attributes of a magazine.
        Parameters:
        optionM - The option number of the magazine to modify.
        newName - The new name of the journal.
        newNumPages - The new number of pages in the journal.
        newdayPublish - The new publication day of the magazine.
        newmonthPublish - The new month of publication for the magazine.
        newyearPublish - The new year of publication of the magazine.
        newURL - The new URL of the journal.
        newcategory - The new category of the magazine. 1 for varieties, 2 for design and 3 for science.
        newvalueSub - The new subscription value of the journal.
        newperiodEmission - The new issue period for the journal.
        Returns:
        true if the journal modification was successful, false otherwise.

      • deleteBooks

        public boolean deleteBooks(int bookIndex)
        Delete a book from the system.
        Parameters:
        bookIndex - The index of the book to remove.
        Returns:
        true if the book was removed successfully, false if the book was not found at the specified index.

      • deleteMagazines

        public boolean deleteMagazines(int magazineIndex)
        Removes a magazine from the system.
        Parameters:
        magazineIndex - The index of the magazine to remove.
        Returns:
        true if the journal was successfully removed, false if the journal was not found at the specified index.
